title: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
description: A simple and elegant roasted chicken.
steps: Pat the chicken dry with paper towels.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan.
Rub the herb mixture all over the chicken
Place the lemon quarters and smashed garlic inside the chicken cavity.
or until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear.
Let the chicken rest for 10-15 minutes before carving.
